Quelles sont les démarches à suivre: What are the steps to follow
préparer: In order to properly prepare for your stay in Tunisia, here are some essential documents that we recommend that you bring with you. Also make photocopies and / or certified true copies
Extrait d’acte de naissance (original et: Extract of birth certificate (original and at least 3 copies)
Diplômes obtenus dans votre pays d’origi: Diplomas obtained in your country of origin or certified true copies
Les notes de vos années d’études univers: The grades of your years of university studies
Photos: ID photos (not scanned, standard size 3.5 x 4.5 cm, light background
Ordonnances, si vous avez un traitement: Prescriptions, if you have specific medical treatment
Si vous êtes marié et votre époux/épouse: If you are married and your spouse is accompanying you
Les mêmes documents que pour vous-même: The same documents as for yourself
Si vous avez des enfants qui viennent av: If you have children who come with you
Nous vous conseillons d’apporter égaleme: We recommend that you also bring
Une somme suffisante en devise pour couv: Sufficient amount in foreign currency to cover your immediate needs
Des vêtements adaptés au climat de la Tu: Clothing adapted to the climate of Tunisia
Ai-je besoin d’un visa pour venir en Tun: Do I need a visa to come to Tunisia
Pour vérifier si vous avez besoin d’un v: To check if you need a visa, visit the Ministry's website
des Affaires Etrangères: Foreign Affairs. If it turns out that you need it, contact the nearest Tunisian consulate
Le groupe Méditerranéen propose des loge: The Mediterranean group offers student accommodation
possède: The university has a home on its Nabeul site and has agreements with private homes for its site in Tunis. She is preparing her site at the Ghazella pole
Existe-t-il d’autres moyens de se loger: Are there other ways to find accommodation
Des appartements meublés peuvent être lo: Furnished apartments can be rented near the faculty
Quel temps fait-il en Tunisie: What's the weather like in Tunisia
La Tunisie bénéficie: Tunisia enjoys a moderate climate with average temperatures between 7 ° C and 18 ° C in winter, 30 ° C and 40 ° C in summer. To know the weather forecast on the day of your arrival, consult the Météo Tunisie website
De quel budget dois-je disposer pour séj: How much budget do I need to stay in Tunisia
Logement: Accommodation, catering, transport, health, outings ... a student who lives in Tunisia on a limited budget requires 200 euros per month

5 minutes: BLP Tunis: 5 minutes from Tunis Carthage airport. Take a Taxi which costs 2 euros and give him the address

Comment bénéficier de la couverture soci: How to benefit from Tunisian social coverage
